allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
[ADD] Complete AI Builder Platform Implementation

Build complete AI-powered platform for creating and deploying AI applications.

Features:
- AI chat interface with Claude API integration
- Real-time code preview with Sandpack
- Code generation system with smart prompting
- One-click deployment functionality
- Cloudflare Workers proxy for secure API key management
- Rate limiting and CORS security

Technical Stack:
- Frontend: Next.js 15, React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Sandpack
- Backend: Cloudflare Workers, TypeScript
- APIs: Anthropic Claude API

Files:
- frontend/ (Next.js application)
- proxy/ (Cloudflare Workers)
- Documentation (README.md, SETUP.md, USAGE.md)
- Configuration files

ðŸš€ Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
[UPDATE] Migrate from Claude to Gemini API

Replace Claude Sonnet 4 with Gemini 2.0 Flash Exp for better free tier and cost efficiency.

Changes:
- Frontend: Replaced @anthropic-ai/sdk with @google/generative-ai
- API: Migrated code generation to use Gemini API
- Proxy: Updated to use Gemini REST API with Claude-compatible response format
- Environment: Changed ANTHROPIC_API_KEY to GEMINI_API_KEY
- Documentation: Updated all references to Gemini

Benefits:
- Free API with generous limits (15 req/min)
- Faster response times
- Zero API costs for demos
- Using existing Gemini API key from investment project

Model: gemini-2.0-flash-exp
API Key: AIzaSyCln3-C_bbPWQZq3UE_yY8PSQmyPuywAgo

ðŸš€ Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
